s: At Sporteer, our passion is creating the world's most user-friendly, high-performance mobile technology accessories for the modern, connected athlete. Not only are our products designed by athletes for athletes, they are thoroughly tested by the same athletes who designed them.

Sporteer was established in 2009 in the sunny desert of Scottsdale, Arizona, where balanced, healthy lifestyles reign supreme. Additional offices in Hong Kong, Thunder Bay, ON, Canada, and the United Kingdom support the Sporteer brand as we strive every day to be world class, worldwide.
